attributes.action: Deny Margaret Thatcher the right of a State Funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unless the so called NEW Labour Party are Tories in disguise, you MUST see that SHE did NOTHING for this country except RUIN it.  Please, for Country sake, put a STOP to it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
